items.sentence: I wonder why Tom didn\'t come to Mary\'s party.
Tom was lucky that somebody helped him do that.
Tom was the one who told Mary where John lived.
My sister has made up her mind to be a teacher.
Tom and I have known each other for many years.
I can remember when you were just a little boy.
I checked into a hotel and went right to sleep.
I had no idea you knew how to play the bassoon.
Tom and Mary are going back to Boston together.
Tom and Mary are going to play tennis tomorrow.
